primary.context: The caller wants to surrender or terminate their ownership contract.
primary.detail: The AI correctly identified the request as out-of-scope and attempted a transfer to concierge, but the caller eventually abandoned after a 25-minute queue wait and no callback option.

steps: Caller requested a human agent immediately.
AI collected caller name and intent (ending ownership).
AI attempted transfer to concierge department.
Caller waited in queue for approximately 25 minutes.
AI returned to the line when no agents were available, offering general info.
Caller requested a callback, which the AI could not provide.
Caller ended the call to try again later.

actions.detail: Attempted transfer to concierge; caller sat in queue for 25 mins.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to terminate their timeshare ownership. The AI correctly identified this as out-of-scope and transferred to concierge, but after a 25-minute wait in the queue, the AI had to resume the call because no human agents were available.
insights.verbatim: I'm calling about our timeshare. We want to no longer have ownership over it.
insights.coaching: The AI handled the out-of-scope request and the subsequent queue failure professionally. No specific agent coaching is required as the friction was caused by human agent unavailability.
